articles.title: Celestial event: Witness Quadrantid meteor shower in India on January 4, details below - Asianet News English
articles.description: One of the brightest meteor showers, the Quadrantids marks their presence between December 28 to January 12, every year.
articles.content: One of the brightest meteor showers, the Quadrantids marks their presence between December 28 to January 12, every year.Welcome the Quadrantids, this year's annual meteor shower will show up after 2:… [+1734 chars]

articles.title: China plans missions to moon's south pole - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): China has approved the fourth phase of its lunar exploration programme, including a basic model of a research station built on the moon over the coming decade, according to the China National Space Administration.
articles.content: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): China has approved the fourth phase of its lunar exploration programme, including a basic model of a research station built on the moon over the coming decade… [+1194 chars]

articles.title: Long-term impact of Indonesia coal ban ‘manageable’ for China - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Indonesia accounted for 74 per cent of all the thermal coal China imported in the first 11 months of 2021, but on Saturday, the Southeast Asian nation banned exports in January to prioritise its own domestic supply.

articles.title: AirAsia seeks name change to Capital A - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: AirAsia Group Bhd is proposing to change its name to Capital A Bhd.
articles.content:
PETALING JAYA: AirAsia Group Bhd is proposing to change its name to Capital A Bhd.
